objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#5D259F'/><stop offset='49%' style='stop-color:#6E30BB'/><stop offset='51%' style='stop-color:#7B38D1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#8A40E8'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#471A7A'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#9A4CCA'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M1080,0 L400,0 L1080,680 Z' fill='#9A4CCA' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0,540 L540,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#471A7A' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#9A4CCA' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.2'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.05'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='30'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='30'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='20'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='20'/><circle cx='300' cy='300' r='15'/><circle cx='780' cy='780' r='15'/></g><path d='M0,0 L0,1080 L1080,0 Z' fill='url(#accentGrad)' opacity='0.8'/></svg>

objects.text:
Breathable Mesh Design
Non-Slip Outsole
Lightweight Construction
Stylish Purple Fashion

product_details.description: Slip on design easy to wear, fashion colour with everything Non-slip Wear-resistant outsole Comfortable and breathable fabric Occasion: casual, walking, running,driving , training, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, workout and so on. Multi-color choose: Black, Brown, Dark Grey, Green Yellow, Blue, Orange, Pink, Purple, Rose Red Sole material - Thermoplastic Polyurethane ** Outer material - Mesh ** Closure type - Pull-On ** Water resistance level - Not Water Resistant **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sporty and modern aesthetic to promote athletic shoes. The background is a dynamic, diagonally-split design with layered gradients and subtle geometric lines and circles, creating depth and visual interest. The banner features a bold main title (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in a futuristic, techno-inspired font, emphasizing the product category. A subheadline (`subheading`) with a sleek, condensed font introduces the product name. Below it, a short description block (`description`) highlights key features in clean typography. A price tag (`price`) stands out in large, rounded font, and a contrasting button (`cta_background` + `cta`) invites action. A floating shoe image (`product_image`) dominates the center, visually reinforcing the product style.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Purple: `#471A7A`
- Medium Purple: `#6E30BB`
- Bright Purple: `#9A4CCA`
- Accent Lavender: `#D1ADFF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Button Text Dark Purple: `#3A1766`
product_color: The product image showcases athletic shoes dominated by a vibrant, rich purple (#5C2D91), used throughout the upper mesh, laces, and sole framework. Complementing this is a deeper eggplant purple (#3B125B) seen on accents and shadowed areas, enhancing depth. White (#FFFFFF) is strategically incorporated in the text and outsole to create contrast and legibility, ensuring design elements stand out. A mid-tone lavender gradient (#A285D1) on the side straps softens transitions and adds dynamic visual layering. These colors blend smoothly with tonal harmony, yet each shade is highlighted by location and texture. This palette creates a bold, energetic banner appealing to youth and active lifestyles.
